message: Let's split it evenly to start, no need to overcomplicate things!
I think you can do better than that, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still being generous!
You're being a bit stingy, Bob! I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give away the farm!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I need to think about my future. You're going to have to meet me halfway if you want to get a decent share.
You're being a bit too greedy, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give away the majority of the money. Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a compromise, Alice. I'm taking a firmer stance now. Meet me at 8k or we're going to end up with nothing.
I'm not backing down, Bob. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up my share entirely. Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.
